name: vulnerability information obtained via Trivy DB

indexes.name: vulnerabilities_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX vulnerabilities_pkey ON public.vulnerabilities USING btree (id)

indexes.name: v_vulnerability_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX v_vulnerability_id_idx ON public.vulnerabilities USING btree (vulnerability_id)

tables.name: public.vulnerability_advisories
tables.comment: vulnerability advisories obtained via Trivy DB

indexes.name: vulnerability_advisories_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX vulnerability_advisories_pkey ON public.vulnerability_advisories USING btree (id)

indexes.name: va_vulnerability_advisories_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_vulnerability_advisories_idx ON public.vulnerability_advisories USING btree (vulnerability_id, platform, segment, package)

indexes.name: va_vulnerability_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_vulnerability_id_idx ON public.vulnerability_advisories USING btree (vulnerability_id)

indexes.name: va_platform_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_platform_idx ON public.vulnerability_advisories USING btree (platform)

indexes.name: va_source_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_source_idx ON public.vulnerability_advisories USING btree (platform, segment)

indexes.name: va_source_package_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_source_package_idx ON public.vulnerability_advisories USING btree (platform, segment, package)

driver.name: postgres
driver.database_version: PostgreSQL 10.21 (Debian 10.21-1.pgdg90+1) on aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu, compiled by gcc (Debian 6.3.0-18+deb9u1) 6.3.0 20170516, 64-bit
